metadata.title: CVE-2016-9645 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The fix for ikiwiki for CVE-2016-10026 was incomplete resulting in editingrestriction bypass for git revert when using git versions older than 2.8.0.This has been fixed in 3.20161229.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9645` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ikiwiki - 20180228-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ikiwiki package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20180228-1').
